column2: an A.M. Eatery////Was impressed with the Denver Snooze Eateries.  They come with a wait
column4: but when you're seated or served
column5: they make you glad you stuck out the wait time.... truly.   I visited the T&C location and was put off at the subtle bitchiness of our waitress.  We had a couple of questions and she literally acted like she was pissed that she had to answer. The ONLY time she was remotely pleasant was when it was time to bring the check. Yes
column6: strawberry blonde with your hair tied back in a pony tail
column7: you know who you are.  All I have to say is the food is the food
